pages.text: The Blackstone Golem is the most deadliest creature in the world of Minecraft. Summoned at the Golem Altar, it will destroy your world until it killed you. If you managed to kill it, however you did this, it will split in half

pages.title: 小石頭魔像
pages.text: Mini Blackstone Golems are remains of the Blackstone Golem and can be found in basalt deltas
